summary: This Senate bill, S. 2339, introduced on July 17, 2025, by Ms. Klobuchar and Mr. Crapo, aims to reauthorize the Young Women’s Breast Health Education and Awareness Requires Learning Young Act of 2009. The bill's short title is the EARLY Act Reauthorization of 2025. The core of the bill amends Section 399NN(h) of the Public Health Service Act, changing the expiration date from 2026 to 2031.
